# The `ScheduleDAGMutation` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Mutate the DAG as a postpass after normal DAG building. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<MembersIndexItem

  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-machinescheduler-cpp-/copyconstrain">CopyConstrain</a></>}>
Post-process the DAG to create weak edges from all uses of a copy to the one use that defines the copy&#39;s source vreg, most likely an induction variable increment. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-machinescheduler-cpp-/copyconstrain/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-macrofusion-cpp-/macrofusion">MacroFusion</a></>}>
Post-process the DAG to create cluster edges between instrs that may be fused by the processor into a single operation. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-macrofusion-cpp-/macrofusion/#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}
